years when used as age for a person (different word than years in some languages)

text: Ti Israel idiay let-ang 1513 agingga iti 1473 K.K.P. – 40 a tawen

479 a tawen sakbay maibangon ti templo – 1 Ar-ari 6:1
english: 479 years until the temple construction – 1 Kings 6:1

text: Nagbautisar ni Jesus idi Otonio 29 K.P.
69 a lawas agingga a dumteng ti Mesias – Daniel 9:25
3.5 a tawen a panagserbi ni Jesus, napapatay idi maika-14 ti Nisan, 33 K.P.
english: 3.5 years of Jesus service, executed Nisan 14th, 33 C.E.

text: pannakaidestiero 607 agingga iti 537 K.K.P. – 70 a tawen (Jeremias 25:11)
7 a panawen – 2520 a tawen agingga iti Mesianiko a Pagarian 1914 C.E. (Daniel 4:23)

text: Isyu ti panagkugit idiay Antioquia, komperensia idiay Jerusalem c. 49 K.P.
english: Circumcision issue at Antioch, conference in Jerusalem c. 49 C.E.

text: Maikatlo a Panagdaliasat ni Pablo kas Misionero c. 52-56 K.P.

english: Paul in custody in Caesarea c. 56-58 C.E.

text: Ti umuna a pannakaibalud ni Pablo idiay Roma c. 59-61 K.P.
english: Paul’s first imprisonment in Rome c. 59-61 C.E.

text: Ti maikadua a pannakaibalud ni Pablo idiay Roma c. 65 K.P., Panaka isurat ti 2 Timoteo , Napapatay ni Pablo
english: Paul’s second imprisonment in Rome c. 65 CE, 2 Timothy written, Paul executed

text: Galba, Otho ken Vitellius (Tawen dagiti Uppat nga Emperador) .

english: Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria

english: Destruction of Jerusalem 607 B.C.E. by Babylon, 390 years after the division of the kingdom (Ezekiel 4:5)

text: Nadadael ti Jerusalem 70 K.P. babaen ken Tito ti Roma
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 70 C.E. by Rome under Titus

english: Vulgate completed by Jerome (Latin translation of the bible) c. 405 C.E.

text: Nayimprenta ti Gutenberg a Biblia idi 1455
Ti Kristiano a Griego a Kasuratan ni Desiderius Erasmus (Rotterdam) naipablaak idi 1516
english: Greek text of Christian Greek Scriptures published by Desiderius Erasmus of Rotterdam 1516

text: Ti Biblia a patarus ni Luther - Setiembre 1522

text: Damo a panaka ipabuya ti “Photo-Drama of Creation” idiay New York idi Enero 11, 1914

text: Nangrugi ti Watchtower Bible School of Gilead idi Lunes, Pebrero 1, 1943
english: Watchtower Bible School of Gilead began on Monday, February 1, 1943

text: Ti libro a “Ti Kinapudno a Mangiturong iti Biag nga Agnanayon” a nairuar idi 1968

text: Nangrugi ti panangasaba iti metropolitan idi 2011

text: Narebisar a “Baro a Lubong a Patarus ti Nasantuan a Kasuratan” a nairuar iti tinawen a miting 2013

text: Baro a pormat ti midweek meeting - naadaa ti “meeting workbook” nangrugi idi Enero 2016

text: Geopolitikal a kasasaad a nailanad a kas “Cold War” 1945-1991

english: This timeline was created in 2023, the hottest year in human history and the last 125,000 years

english: Leningrad Codex written in Cairo AD 1008
